channel.title: Meta on Terminal
channel.description: Recent content in Meta on Terminal

item.title: wormgears
item.description: Andrew Gelman says I should have a blog. No, really. Well, he said he prefers it to Twitter. That we should write about our personal experiences. Someone pointed out, helpfully, in the comments, that free speech is not hot to trot right now. (Boy oh boy could we unpack that statement.) For better or for worse, the repression of free speech situation is a sort of essential part of my personal experiences right now.
